query: Did I have radiation therapy recently?
resource_summaries:
This record describes a completed external beam radiation therapy procedure performed on a patient with a diagnosis of malignant neoplasm of the breast at South Shore Hospital Inc. on September 19, 2022.
The patient underwent a completed external beam radiation therapy procedure for a malignant neoplasm of the breast at South Shore Hospital Inc. on September 29, 2022.
answer: Yes, you had radiation therapy recently. You underwent external beam radiation therapy for a malignant neoplasm of the breast at South Shore Hospital Inc. on September 29, 2022.
